isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Electric Window Regulator Assembly with Power Window Motor
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position electric window regulator assembly (Item 6) onto back side of inner door panel (Item 3) and install ten hex head mach. screws (Item 4) from front side of inner door panel (Item 5) and tighten.
Connect electric window regulator motor connector (Item 1) onto electric window regulator motor (Item 2) on back side of inner door panel (Item 3).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position upper door trim panel (Item 3) in place on front side of inner door panel (Item 6) and align two flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners (Item 5) with mounting holes on inner door panel and push both flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners through inner door panel.

Install cab door grab handle onto upper door trim panel. Refer to
CAB DOOR GRAB HANDLE
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Grab Handle.

If vehicle is so equipped, install electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly onto upper door trim panel. Refer to
ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly.

Install inner door handle onto upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly. Refer to
INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Install Driver Side Inner Door Handle.

Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Manual Window Regulator Assembly
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 67 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position manual window regulator assembly (Item 3) on back side of inner door panel (Item 4) and install six hex head mach. screws (Item 1) from front side of inner door panel (Item 2).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position upper door trim panel (Item 3) in place on front side of inner door panel (Item 6) and align two flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners (Item 5) with mounting holes on inner door panel and push both flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners through inner door panel.

Install cab door grab handle onto upper door trim panel. Refer to
CAB DOOR GRAB HANDLE
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Grab Handle.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 66 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is so equipped, position electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) onto upper door trim panel (Item 4) and install two pan head mach. screws (Item 2) and tighten.

Install inner door handle onto upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly. Refer to
INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Install Driver Side Inner Door Handle.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 161 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Hold upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) up to cab door with back side of inner door panel (Item 2) facing cab door, position wiring harness push-in fasteners (Item 3) in place on back side of inner door panel and align push-in fasteners with wiring harness mounting holes of inner door panel. Push the push-in fasteners through inner door panel. If so equipped, connect electric door lock switch connector (Item 4) to back of electric door lock switch assembly (Item 5) and connect wiring harness connector (Item 6) to electric door lock actuator (Item 7).

figure.caption: Figure 161. Cab Door Wiring Harness on Inner Door Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 65 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: While holding upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door, connect cab door courtesy light switch connector (Item 8) to cab door courtesy light switch.

Hold upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door and install inner door handle control rod (Item 6) into door latch inner door handle control rod (Item 7) from door latch assembly (Item 4) and slide retaining clip (Item 5) onto inner door handle control rod to secure them together.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) over door lock control rod (Item 2) and slide down into position on cab door.
Hold upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) onto cab door and install six pan head torx screws (Item 11) securing it to cab door.

If so equipped, through access opening in inner door panel (Item 6), install electric door lock control rod of electric door lock actuator (Item 9) into electric door lock control rod (Item 10) and slide retaining clip (Item 8) onto lock control rod of electric door lock actuator.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 63 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If necessary, temporarily slide window regulator handle (Item 1) onto window regulator handle shaft (Item 2) and align mounting holes in window regulator assembly (Item 6) with window regulator bracket (Item 7) on window and install two hex head mach. screws (Item 5) securing them together.
Using window regulator handle (Item 1) raise cab window glass up enough to remove wood block (Item 3), 12.5 inches long, through opening in inner door panel (Item 4).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Thread door lock knob (Item 1) onto door lock control rod (Item 2) sticking through opening in upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3).

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Install Passenger Side Inner Door Handle.
